item.title: At Avdiyivka direction Russian army shelled Novobakhmutivka, Berdychi, Semenivka, Pervomayske and Nevelske of Donetsk region.... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: At Avdiyivka direction Russian army shelled Novobakhmutivka, Berdychi, Semenivka, Pervomayske and Nevelske of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Umanske and Semenivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report

item.title: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Huta-Studenetska, Bleshnya, Karpovychi of Chernihiv regio... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Huta-Studenetska, Bleshnya, Karpovychi of Chernihiv region, Bilopillya, Kindrativka, Zapsillya of Sumy region, Kozacha Lopan, Vovchansk, Krasne, Neskuchne of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Seredyna-Buda and Vorozhba of Sumy region, Zemlyanky, Potykhonove, Bolohivka of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report

item.title: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Holubivka, Dvorichna, Synkivka of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airst... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Holubivka, Dvorichna, Synkivka of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Kyslivka of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report

item.title: Ukrainian military had 64 combat engagements with Russian forces near Bilohorivka of Luhansk region and Terny, Yampolivka, Ro... (LiveUAMap)

item.title: March 24 this year at. 4.23, there was a violation of Polish airspace by one of the cruise missiles launched this night by lo... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: March 24 this year at. 4.23, there was a violation of Polish airspace by one of the cruise missiles launched this night by long-range aviation of the Russian Federation. The targets of the strikes were towns in western Ukraine - it was reported. The missile stayed over Poland for 39 seconds and was monitored by military radar systems the entire time.
